vulnerability.title: Disable the use of user namespaces
vulnerability.description: To set the runtime status of the user.max_user_namespaces kernel parameter, run the following command: $ sudo sysctl -w user.max_user_namespaces=0 To make sure that the setting is persistent, add the following line to a file in the directory /etc/sysctl.d: user.max_user_namespaces = 0 When containers are deployed on the machine, the value should be set to large non-zero value.
vulnerability.recommendation: Review and remediate: Disable the use of user namespaces
